00012 #include <stdio.h>
00013 #include <stdlib.h>
00014 #include <unistd.h>
00015 #include <math.h>

00017 #include "fmd/Parameterization.h"

00019 #include "fmd/SlaterDet.h"
00020 
00021 #include "misc/utils.h"
00022 #include "misc/physics.h"

00025 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00026 {
00027   createinfo(argc, argv);
00028 
00029   int cm=1;
00030   double d=10.0;
00031   double E=0.0, p=0.0;
00032   double b=0.0;
00033 
00034   double xA[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, xB[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00035   double vA[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, vB[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00036   double alphaA=0.0, alphaB=0.0;
00037   double betaA=0.0, betaB=0.0;
00038   double gammaA=0.0, gammaB=0.0;
00039 
00040   int c, i;
00041 
00042   if (argc < 3) {
00043     fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [OPTIONS] NucA NucB JoinedNuc\n"
00044             "\n  -c            center of mass system (default)"
00045             "\n  -l            lab system, Nucleus A at x=0 in rest"
00046             "\n  -d dist       distance of nuclei [fm]"
00047             "\n  -p momentum   relative momentum of nuclei [fm^-1]"
00048             "\n  -b impact     impact parameter (default 0 fm)"
00049             "\n  -r Aalpha,beta,gamma     rotate NucA by alpha, beta, gamma (degrees)"
00050             "\n  -r Balpha,beta,gamma     rotate NucB by alpha, beta, gamma (degrees)"
00051             "\n  -E energy     E/A in lab frame (default 0 MeV)\n",
00052     argv[0]);
00053     exit(-1);
00054   }
00055 
00056   /* manage command line options */
00057 
00058   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "cld:p:E:b:r:")) != -1)
00059     switch (c) {
00060     case 'c':
00061       cm=1;
00062       break;
00063     case 'l':
00064       cm=0;
00065       break;
00066     case 'd':
00067       d = atof(optarg);
00068       break;
00069     case 'p':
00070       p = atof(optarg);
00071       break;
00072     case 'b':
00073       b = atof(optarg);
00074       break;
00075     case 'E':
00076       E = atof(optarg);
00077       break;
00078     case 'r':
00079       if (optarg[0] == 'A') {
00080         sscanf(++optarg, "%lf,%lf,%lf", &alphaA, &betaA, &gammaA);
00081         alphaA *= M_PI/180;
00082         betaA *= M_PI/180;
00083         gammaA *= M_PI/180;
00084       }
00085       else if (optarg[0] == 'B') {
00086         sscanf(++optarg, "%lf,%lf,%lf", &alphaB, &betaB, &gammaB);
00087         alphaB *= M_PI/180;
00088         betaB *= M_PI/180;
00089         gammaB *= M_PI/180;
00090       } 
00091       break;
00092     }
00093      
00094  
00095   char* QAfile = argv[optind];
00096   char* QBfile = argv[optind+1];
00097   char* Qfile = argv[optind+2];
00098 
00099   SlaterDet QA, QB, Q;
00100   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&QA, QAfile)) {
00101     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read %s\n", QAfile);
00102     exit(-1);
00103   }
00104   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&QB, QBfile)) {
00105     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read %s\n", QBfile);
00106     exit(-1);
00107   }
00108 
00109   double massA, massB, mass;
00110 
00111   massA = QA.Z*mproton+QA.N*mneutron;
00112   massB = QB.Z*mproton+QB.N*mneutron;
00113   mass = massA+massB;
00114 
00115   if (E != 0.0) {
00116     E = QA.A*E/hbc;
00117     p = sqrt(2.0*massA*E);
00118   }
00119 
00120   if (cm) {
00121     xA[2] = -massB/mass*d;
00122     xB[2] = massA/mass*d;
00123     xA[1] = -massB/mass*b;
00124     xB[1] = massA/mass*b;
00125 
00126     // vA[2] = p/massA*(1-massA/mass);
00127     // vB[2] = -p/massA*(massA/mass);
00128     vA[2] = -p/massA;
00129     vB[2] = p/massB;
00130   } else {
00131     // xA[2] = -d; xA[1] = -b;
00132     // vA[2] = p/massA;
00133     xB[2] = d; xB[1] = b;
00134     vB[2] = p/massB;
00135   }
00136 
00137   rotateSlaterDet(&QA, alphaA, betaA, gammaA);
00138   boostSlaterDet(&QA, vA);
00139   moveSlaterDet(&QA, xA);
00140 
00141   rotateSlaterDet(&QB, alphaB, betaB, gammaB);
00142   boostSlaterDet(&QB, vB);
00143   moveSlaterDet(&QB, xB);
00144 
00145   joinSlaterDets(&QA, &QB, &Q);
00146   
00147   Parameterization P = ParameterizationFMD;
00148   Para q;
00149   SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00150 
00151   // write joined SlaterDet parameters
00152   
00153   FILE* outfp;
00154  
00155   fprintf(stderr, "... writing joined SlaterDet to file %s\n", Qfile);
00156   if (!(outfp = fopen(Qfile, "w"))) {
00157     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", Qfile);
00158     exit(-1);
00159   }
00160 
00161   fprintinfo(outfp);
00162 
00163   fprintf(outfp, "\n# joined SlaterDets from %s and %s\n",
00164           QAfile, QBfile);
00165   
00166   fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00167   fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00168   P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00169 
00170   fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00171   writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00172 
00173   fclose(outfp);
00174 
00175   exit(0);
00176 }
